comment._content: Who painted this?  There are 6 concept paintings with the same signature, but I can't read it.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/75783566@N02] Lee, I can't read them either, however they are stamped "General Dynamics Convair Aerospace Division" on the back....so I would assume that the artist worked for GD
